headline.main: URGE CORRELATION OF SCHOOL TO WAR; Educators at Capital Institute Agree on Need to Adjust to Man Power Demands

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 31 -- Revision of high school programs, modification of college entrance examinations and other adjustments designed to correlate schools to the war, were adopted at today's closing session of the Institute on Education and the War.
abstract: Wartime: educators discuss need for Fed financing

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: EDUCATION AND THE WAR, NATL INST OF
